tool_description: VietMoney OpenAPI (1.0) is open api to allow e-wallet, banking, collection easier to integrate VietMoney services.
name: VietMoney OpenAPI
title: VietMoney OpenAPI

api_list.name: Create an order
api_list.description: This api allow partner can create an order
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vietmoney-openapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/sales/v1/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vietmoney-openapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vietmoney-openapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/sales/v1/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vietmoney-openapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
